response.overview: Julia, Silvia, Mariana and Sara have been friends since they studied acting at university. They haven't all seen each other in a while, because since they got married they started to stop seeing each other. Now Sara's death finds them again, a sudden cardiac arrest. Moved by the death of their friend and the reunion, the three women let loose together into a mourning, a drunkenness, that takes them through various emotional states that, finally, end up reaffirming the friendship between the three, by celebrating the departure of the friend gone and celebrate life. The night of mourning is left behind in the dawn of the new day that arrives.
response.title: Esposas
